des:
Koocam is the smart security solution that lets you watch over your doorstep. 

Before you get started, please make sure your Koocam device is online. Then enable the Koocam Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Koocam Skill" and you will be directed to link your Koocam account with your Alexa account.

With a Koocam camera, you can hear and speak to people in front of your camera from your FireTVs, Echo Show, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot). Simply say:
“Alexa, answer the front door.”
“Alexa, talk to the backyard.”

To view activity from your Koocam camera, say:
“Alexa, show the front door.”

To stop your feed, say:
“Alexa, hide the front door.”
“Alexa, stop.”

To see your most recent video clip from your camera, say:
“Alexa, show me the last activity from the front door.”
“Alexa, show the most recent event from the backyard.”
“Alexa, pause.”

If you Share your Koocam devices with other users in the KoocM app, they can use Alexa to see who’s at your home, too.
